markdownRemark.excerpt: Time execution varies between computers, so instead of talking about seconds or miliseconds, we talk about complexity to describe how long or how much space…
markdownRemark.html:
Time execution varies between computers, so instead of talking about seconds or miliseconds, we talk about complexity to describe how long or how much space would an algorithm take.
